function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unwillingness or inability to invest in specialized medical devices or wearables","Impact":"Limited access to advanced healthcare services, potential exacerbation of health issues","Mitigation":"Developing low-cost and self-help medical solutions using off-the-shelf devices","Technologies":"Smartphones, home audio systems","People":"Population with limited resources or access to specialized healthcare","Owner":"Medical technology developers, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Reliance on expensive research-grade wearable devices","Impact":"Limited accessibility to healthcare monitoring and screening, especially for low-income populations","Mitigation":"Replacing research-grade wearables with affordable smartwatches","Technologies":"Smartwatches, affordable healthcare technology","People":"Low-income populations, communities with limited healthcare resources","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, technology developers"},{"Description":"Obstacles in smart home IoT adoption due to cost and technical skills requirement","Impact":"Limited accessibility to smart home technology, exclusion of non-tech-savvy individuals","Mitigation":"Developing plug-and-play solutions for easy deployment, equipping home devices with intelligence and context-awareness","Technologies":"Plug-and-play smart home devices, context-aware technology","People":"Non-tech-savvy individuals, populations with limited access to smart home technology","Owner":"Smart home technology developers, IoT companies"}]}
